title: ‘Nothing short of horrific’: Mass. politicians react to fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was fatally shot during a political event at Utah Valley University, prompting calls to end political violence.
Massachusetts leaders, including Gov. Maura Healey and Sen. Elizabeth Warren, condemned the shooting and called for political peace.
Kirk's death was announced by President Trump; Massachusetts Republican leaders praised Kirk's impact on young voters and his family mourned.

title: Patriots injury report: Christian Gonzalez not practicing, along with 2 key vets
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Christian Gonzalez, out since July with a hamstring injury, missed Patriots practice ahead of their game against the Dolphins.
Harold Landry (foot) and Morgan Moses (foot) also did not practice, raising concerns for their availability in Week 2.
Wide receiver Kayshon Boutte was limited in practice due to a shoulder injury after a strong Week 1 performance.

title: Drake Maye talks starting fast, capitalizing in the red zone, and the throws he wished he had back
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Drake Maye admitted he rushed some throws in the Patriots' season-opener loss to the Raiders.
The Patriots struggled in the red zone, finishing 1-for-3, while Las Vegas converted their single opportunity.
Coach Mike Vrabel might evaluate if Maye is handling Josh McDaniels's offense too heavily post-game review.

title: What Celtics star Jaylen Brown said about potentially playing for hometown team
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Jaylen Brown expressed interest in potentially playing for his hometown team, the Atlanta Hawks, during a radio show.
Brown remains a key player for the Celtics, especially with Jayson Tatum out due to injury this upcoming season.
Despite trade rumors, Brown is under contract with Boston for four more years after signing a supermax extension in 2023.

title: What’s causing vibration in my 15-year-old car?
author: John Paul
bullets: A reader with a 2010 Mazda Miata experiencing highway-speed vibration is advised to check tire balance and inspect steering components.
A slight flat spot or out-of-round wheel may cause vibrations; inspection of suspension for wear is also advised.
The Miata, a summer vehicle, is stored on a wood panel floor, which could potentially affect tire condition over winter.

title: 17-year-old stabbed inside Roxbury high school, no arrests, police say
author: Molly Farrar
bullets: A 17-year-old was stabbed at Madison Park High School in Roxbury around noon on Wednesday, police report.
The victim sustained a non-life-threatening stab wound and was treated at a hospital; no suspect has been arrested.
Madison Park and John D. O’Bryant schools were briefly in safe mode; the investigation is ongoing.

title: Report: Ex-Patriots QB Mac Jones is ‘in line’ to start for 49ers on Sunday
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Mac Jones is set to start for the 49ers against the Saints due to Brock Purdy's injuries.
Brock Purdy is unlikely to play and could be sidelined for multiple weeks, according to coach Kyle Shanahan.
Jones joined the 49ers this offseason, signing a two-year, $8.1 million deal after one season with the Jaguars.

title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk fatally shot in act of ‘political assassination’ at Utah college
author: The Associated Press
bullets: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk was shot dead at Utah Valley University in an event labeled as a 'political assassination.'
A person of interest is in custody as authorities and the FBI investigate, with no other suspects identified.
Utah Valley University was evacuated and closed following the shooting; classes are canceled until further notice.

title: Patriots’ defensive coordinator Terrell Williams will be away from team for a few days
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: Patriots defensive coordinator Terrell Williams will be away from the team for a few days due to a health issue.
Inside linebackers coach Zak Kuhr temporarily filled Williams's role previously, but Mike Vrabel hasn’t confirmed play-calling duties for the Dolphins game.
Williams's absence is unrelated to a previous health incident in March, and his recovery remains a priority, according to Vrabel.

title: 8 unforgettable fall destinations in Vermont, according to Boston.com readers
author: Kristi Palma
bullets: Boston.com readers recommend Franklin County's rail trails for fall explorations, citing the 93-mile Lamoille Valley and 26.4-mile Missisquoi Valley trails.
Scenic Route 100 Byway, running through Stowe and Waterbury, is praised for its iconic fall foliage and proximity to the Ben & Jerry’s Factory.
The Sun Lodge at Bromley Mountain in Peru is a suggested destination for its stunning views, affordability, and newly renovated accommodations.
